message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high quality and unique features, I'm extending an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire it at an introductory price of $12000. This special offer is valid for the next 48 hours.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9500 for the product.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your current budget constraints. In light of this, I am willing to consider a counteroffer of $10500 for the product. This still represents a significant discount from our original price, while allowing us to accommodate your financial situation. Please let me know if this proposal works for you.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering your latest offer, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10000 for the product. This aligns closely with my budget and I hope it will be acceptable.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I've considered your most recent proposal carefully. In order to move forward, I am willing to offer the product at a price of $10250. This reflects a reasonable compromise between our positions, while still providing a good return for us. I hope this aligns with your budget and expectations.

I appreciate your efforts to reach a compromise, Alice. Considering your latest offer, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10000 for the product. This aligns closely with my budget and I hope it will be acceptable.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your budget constraints. To facilitate a closing decision, I am prepared to offer the product at a price of $10125. This represents a further compromise and allows us to move closer to your proposed figure while still ensuring a fair return for us. I hope this proposal meets your expectations.

Thank you for your flexibility, Alice. Considering your latest offer, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10000 for the product. This aligns closely with my budget and I hope it will be acceptable.

Thank you for your patience and understanding, Bob. I appreciate your commitment to finding a mutually beneficial solution. In light of your latest proposal, I am willing to offer the product at a final price of $10075. This figure represents a slight adjustment that aims to bring us closer together while still ensuring a reasonable profit margin for us. I hope this final offer will be satisfactory.

Thank you for your efforts, Alice. Considering your latest offer, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $10000 for the product. This aligns closely with my budget and I hope it will be acceptable.
